attribute.text: Must have LOST KEYS to open
Change MAGIC II to IV and VIII to III
Remove all magic demons and imps
Do not write move in advance
Add spell and MAGIC chit to artifact
Change MOVE L=1, M=2, H=3, T=4
Change MAGIC III to II and VII to VI
Change MAGIC IV to VIII and VI to V
Add one to all SEARCH die rolls
Ask question with yes/no or number answer
Not affected by spells, curses, demons, or imp
Move unseen searcher (PEER only), can SPELL
Roll to see number of phases lost
Must FLY T1 one hex (mountain only)
Roll for Power of the Pit attack
Add one to all die rolls
Add one sharpness to damage caused by weapon
Group becomes FRIENDLY (works on giants and ogres too)
Roll HIDE each round - Use MAGIC SIGHT
Can FLY L1 in encounter combat and movement
Choose when your written move is executed
Immune to spells for one phase
Not attacked by warning or sound chits
MOVE and FIGHT with one monster
Move sound chit to or from your hex
No combat limit to effort * (discard to warlock)
Move all wounds to fatigue (discard to order)
FIGHT hits on tie speed (discard to crone)
Any armor stops wounds (discard to crone)
Add sharpness to weapon (discard to crone)
Weapon ignores all armor (discard to crone)
Roll to get WISH and CURSE
Cancels one spell or curse (discard to shaman)
Counts like T armor, any blow (discard to shaman)
-1 to LOCATE rolls in LOST CITY

attribute.text: -1 to LOCATE rolls in LOST CASTLE

attribute.text: -1 to LOCATE rolls in any RUINS clearing
PEER or SPELL in any hex
Control red die on spell rolls

attributeVal.N0: 1d:hide,locate,loot,peer,readrunes,magicsight,meeting,commerce,selling:% woods
TRACKING SKILLS: When on any tile labeled WOODS, roll 1 die instead of 2 for all Search, Hide, and Meeting die rolls.
ARCHER: Roll 1 die instead of 2 on the Missile Table.
EXPERT WOODCRAFT: When on a Woods clearing (except on the RUINS and VALLEY tiles), roll 1 die instead of 2 for all Search, Hide, and Meeting rolls.
DISEMBODIED: You must use Magic Sight when you search.
AURA OF POWER: Get one extra SPELL phase every day.
ROBUST: Get one extra REST phase every day.
BERSERK: Alert the BERSERK chit to increase your vulnerability to Tremendous.
HEALTH: Get one extra REST phase every day.
HONOR: Subtract 1 from all Meeting Table die rolls.
CONCEALMENT: Roll 1 die instead of 2 for all HIDE die rolls.
PEACE WITH NATURE: Sound/Warning chits do not summon monsters.
EARTH ABSORBS: Curses have no effect on you.
LULL: Site chits do not summon monsters.
Winged Demon
HEAVENLY PROTECTION: Demons and the Imp cannot attack you.
LEARNING: Roll 1 die instead of 2 for all Reading Runes die rolls.
KNOWLEDGE: Subtract 1 from all Reading Runes die rolls.
FAMILIAR: The Witch has an invisible companion that can MOVE, FOLLOW, and PEER separately from her.
SHORT LEGS: You cannot use Sunlight phases. Each REST action is worth double.
CAVE KNOWLEDGE: When in a Cave clearing, roll 1 die instead of 2 for all Search, Hide, and Meeting die rolls.
ELUSIVENESS: Get one extra HIDE phase every day.
ARCHER: Roll 1 die instead of 2 on the Missile Table.
LORE: Roll 1 die instead of 2 for all Reading Runes die rolls.
AURA OF POWER: Get one extra SPELL phase every day.
AIM: Subtract 1 from all Missile Table die rolls.
FEAR: Roll 1 die instead of 2 for all Meeting Table die rolls.
MAGICAL PARAPHERNALIA: Get one extra ALERT phase every day.
KNOWLEDGE: Subtract 1 from all Reading Runes die rolls.
CHARMS: At midnight, all prepared MAGIC chits become unprepared without fatiguing.
LORE: Roll 1 die instead of 2 for all Reading Runes die rolls.

attributeVal.N1: EXPERIENCE: Use secret passages and hidden paths freely.

attributeVal.N0: LORE: Roll 1 die instead of 2 for all Reading Runes die rolls.
EXPERIENCE: Use secret passages and hidden paths freely.
ELVISH STUDIES: MOVE M5 becomes MAGIC III2*
LONG PRACTICE: Use SPELL phases to do enchantments without doing SPX.
Magic Guild
LONG PRACTICE: Use SPELL phases to do enchantments without doing SPX.

attribute.note3: Enchant Artifact, Fiery Blast, and Eye of the Moon

attributeVal.N0: AIM: Subtract 1 from all Missile Table die rolls.
REPUTATION: When at a Dwelling, get one extra phase (limit 1 per day).
LEADERSHIP: Roll 1 die instead of 2 for all HIRE die rolls.
AIM: Subtract 1 from all Missile Table die rolls.
STAMINA: Get one extra MOVE phase every day.
BARTER: Roll 1 die instead of 2 for all TRADE die rolls.
CLEVER: During Daylight, choose when to take your turn.

attribute.text: See or change the coming weather

attribute.description: Light snow swirls across the frozen earth
If not in cave or dwelling during Birdsong, you must immediately fatigue one asterisk.
Ice-crusted snow underfoot and still, frigid air
Each time a character ends a phase of his turn outside, he must fatigue one asterisk.
Deep, drifting snow blankets the world
Melting snows and late blizzards
No one can use the HIDE table.
Flooding as snows melt and cold rains run off
Sprouts and blossoms bloom in milder weather
Full, green trees in long, sunny days
Hot, clear days
If a character is not in a cave or mountain clearing during Birdsong, he must fatigue one asterisk
Very hot, humid and still air
Each time a character ends a phase of his turn in a mountain clearing, he must fatigue one asterisk.
Golden fields of ripening crops
Brightly colored leaves on frosty mornings
Dead leaves blowing in long, cold nights
No one can use the PEER table to search.
Cold rains on barren trees and ground
No one can use the HIDE table.

attributeVal.N0: Ogre Queen:93f43977fdfb5919c3146ab020beaef6
Monster Roll
RealmSpeak Version 1.2.2.6
PAGAN: Immune to Curses [L1]
UGLY: +1 to all rolls COMMERCE, TRADE, HIRE, and MEETING tables. [L2]
SLAVE: Has an Ogre companion.Commands Ogres [L3]
PET: Has a Wolf companion. [L4]
Wolf 2
OGRE QUEEN: Command Ogres

attribute.extra_notes: Every once in a while, a crazy elf is born. The tribe does what it can to help, but most of the time madness leads to crime and crime leads to banishment.

attributeVal.N0: MARKSMAN: Roll 1 die on Missile table
LOCKPICKING: Can open chest, crypt and vault
FAIRY ESSENCE: All items except Books are restricted, [LVL 1]
PAGAN: Immune to Curses. [LVL 2]
WOODS LORE: Is a source of GOLD magic. [LVL 4]
FOREIGNER: Adds one to all rolls on the COMMERCE, TRADE, and HIRE tables. [Level 1]
AIM: Subtracts one from all rolls on the MISSILE table. [Level 2]
STOUT: Rest Counts Double. [Level 3]
ANCIENT MAPS: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the LOCATE, and PEER tables in the Ruins, Lost Castle, and Lost City. [Level 4]
1d:locate,peer:%ruins%,lost castle%,lost city%
PAGAN: Immune to Curses. [Level 2]
HEAVENLY PROTECTION: Immune to the Balrog, Imp, Demon, and Flying Demon. [Level 4]
PERSEVERANCE: Gets an extra SEARCH phase.
TRAINED EYE: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the LOCATE table or any of the Treasures within Treasures tables.
1d:toadstool circle,enchanted meadow,crypt of the knight,locate:all

attribute.extra_notes: The Warlock is a wielder of Dark Magic energies. Though he has wide capabilities he will need to spend more time resting.

attributeVal.N0: SEETHING MAGIC: Is attuned to Magic energy, Extra Spell Phase
RUNIC STUDIES: Studied Ancient Runes extensively. Roll 1 die instead of 2 for all Reading Runes die Rolls.
MOUNTED: Starts with a Warhorse in inventory.
CLUMSY: Adds one to all rolls.
HOLY SPIRIT: Demonic Immunity
ANCIENT SCRIPTURE: 1 die on Read Runes table
IN GOD'S NAME: Immunity to curses.
ANCIENT REALM LORE: Roll one die on PEER, LOCATE and READING RUNES in the RUINS, Lost City and Lost Castle tiles.
1d:readrunes,locate,peer:%ruins%,lost castle%,lost city%
KNOWLEDGE OF THE REALM: As Wizard's EXPERIENCE.
WEALTHY: Starts out with 20 gold, instead of the usual 10. [Level 1]
LEGENDARY: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the COMMERCE, TRADE, HIRE, and MEETING tables. [Level 4]

attribute.extra_notes: A modification of an original design by John Hickman.

attributeVal.N0: HORSE BODY: The Centaur cannot equip a Suit of Armor, and cannot ride a horse of any kind.
HORSE ENDURANCE: Gets an extra MOVE phase.
HOOVES: The centaur can attack without a weapon, for the full amount of harm and speed listed on the chit (zero sharpness, zero length)

attribute.extra_notes: This character requires Robin's Productive Dwarf optional rule.

attributeVal.N0: SHORT LEGS: Must spend one extra MOVE phase to enter a non-Cave clearing.
NIGHT VISION: Extra Phase in Caves
MISER: Gets an extra CACHE phase.
CAVE KNOWLEDGE: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the SEARCH, HIDE, and MEETING tables in Caves.
BAD VISION: Adds one to all rolls on the LOOT, PEER, READ RUNES, LOCATE, and MAGIC SIGHT tables.
STURDINESS: Rest Counts Double
GIANT SIZE: Adds one to all rolls on the HIDE table.
EXTRAORDINARY THROWING POWER: Subtracts one from all rolls on the MISSILE table.
1d:hide,locate,loot,peer,readrunes,magicsight,meeting,commerce:% woods
TRACKING SKILLS: When on any tile labeled WOODS, roll 1 die instead of 2 for all Search, Hide, and Meeting die rolls.
ARCHER: Roll 1 die instead of 2 on the Missile Table.
EXPERT WOODCRAFT: When on a Woods clearing (except on the RUINS and VALLEY tiles), roll 1 die instead of 2 for all Search, Hide, and Meeting rolls.
PILLAGER: Raider mentality is always looking for targets which means an extra search phase.
ARABIAN STEED: Light horse carries the Saracen to war.
SHARP: Gets an extra ALERT phase. [Level 2]
TENACIOUS: Effort Limit of 3. [Level 4]
CONCEALMENT: Thank the Wood Sprites. Roll one die instead of two for all HIDE rolls.
CREEPY COMPANION: You adopt a fascinating predator (scorpion) as a companion.
DRUIDIC PROHIBITION: Priests of your rank may use magical swords or wooden javelins, but no other missile or metal weapons.
Morning Star
FEAR: Natives cower before your unsavory reputation. Subtract one from all MEETING, TRADE, and HIRE rolls
BATTLE MAGIC: Gains an extra Alert phase each turn
HIGHLY TRAINED: Magic chits do not fatigue when alerted and unused
PAGAN: Immune to Curses. [Level 1]
LONG LEGS: Gets an extra MOVE phase. [Level 2]
GIANT SIZE: Adds one to all rolls on the HIDE table.
STRENGTH: Effort Limit of 3. [Level 4]
RENUNCIATION: Starts out with 0 gold, instead of the usual 10, and she cannot acquire Gold, and gets none in return for anything she sells.
AURA OF GOOD: Is a source of WHITE magic.
HEAVENLY PROTECTION: She has an Aura chit, which may be used like the Berserker's Berserk chit to make her vulnerability Tremendous.
NAIVE: Immune to Curses
ARCANE WISDOM: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the READ RUNES table.
KNOWLEDGE: Subtract 1 from all Reading Runes die rolls.
CHARMS: At midnight, all prepared MAGIC chits become unprepared without fatiguing.
STEALTH: Extra HIDE phase.
SMOKE BOMBS: Only rolls one die on the STUMBLE table.

SNAKE TONGUE: The Vizier learned the tongue of the snakes early in life, and thus knows how to talk his way out of trouble with these monsters. As such, he cannot attack or be attacked by any Serpent or Viper.
SNAKE WHISPER: Has a Viper companion as a permanent hireling. If the companion is killed, it is lost for the remainder of the game, or until you achieve a new level (development rules).
BLIND: Must use Magic Sight when Searching. [Level 1]
AURA OF POWER: Can record one extra Enchant phase. [Level 2]
STORM SUMMONING: Can record Remote Enchant phases. [Level 4]
DIM WIT: Cannot use spell books or any weapons other than staff, axe, short sword or broadsword.
Morning Star
SAVANT: Remembers everything he's ever seen. Rolls one die on the Locate table.
BLESSED: Rolls one die on the Wish table.
INSIGNIFICANT: Nobody bothers with a fool. -1 to meeting rolls.

attribute.extra_notes: The Blood Witch is an assassin for hire trained by the Dark Sisters, a secret society of demon worshipers.

attributeVal.N0: DARK PACT: Immune to Curses
SHADOW WALKER: Extra Hide phase
CRYSTAL BALL: Can peer in any clearing.

DIVINATION: A skilled tarot reader and crystal ball gazer, the Gypsy need not record her turns in advance. She has an uncanny ability to predict the movements of denizens and adventurers in the Realm and can react to events as they unfold.
TRACKING SKILLS: As WOODS GIRL
1d:magicsight,readrunes,locate,hide,peer,meeting,loot:% woods
PEACE WITH NATURE: As DRUID
LANCER: Restricted from having an active Helmet, Shield, Breastplate, or Armor in inventory. [Level 1]
TREE HUGGER: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the HIDE table in Woods tiles [Level 2]
1d:hide:% woods
FOREST FRIEND: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the COMMERCE, TRADE, and MEETING tables in Woods tiles. [Level 4]
1d:commerce,trade,meeting:% woods
ZANSHIN: Gets an extra ALERT phase.
SHOSHIN: Effort Limit of 3

HONOR: Confers an advantage. The Samurai may not attack any character who has less fame and/or notoriety unless targeted by that character first (Note: this ability has not been implemented into Realmspeak yet).

attribute.extra_notes: The Old Wizard is Powerful and Experienced

Spear Goblin

Sword Goblin
CAVE KNOWLEDGE: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all Search, Hide, and Meeting rolls in Caves.
SQUIRE: Has a Sword Orc companion as a permanent hireling. If the companion is killed, it is lost for the remainder of the game, or until you achieve a new level (development rules).
Sword Orc
SUPERIOR SWORDSMAN: When all of the maneuver speeds of targets you are attacking are greater than 4, you can shift your attack to any Attack Circle you choose before battle resolution.
STORYTELLER: Subtracts one from all rolls on the HIRE, and MEETING tables. [Level 2]
LORE: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the READ RUNES table. [Level 4]

attribute.extra_notes: White Witch follows the Light Magic paths and wants to restore peace and healing to the Realm.

attributeVal.N0: LIGHT AURA: Emits an Aura of Light. Gives Extra Phase in Caves
PURE SPIRIT: Is unaffected by Curses
LIGHT FORCE: Unaffected by Demons or Imps
POOR: Starts out with 0 gold, instead of the usual 10.
PET: Has a Squirrel companion as a permanent hireling. If the companion is killed, it is lost for the remainder of the game, or until you achieve a new level (development rules). [Level 2]
BARTER: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the TRADE table. [Level 4]
CONCEALMENT: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the HIDE table.
AMBUSH: Roll 1 die on the MISSILE table when attacking from Ambush with Bow or Dagger.

ASCETIC: Immune to Curses
AIM: Subtracts one from all rolls on the MISSILE table. [Level 2]
SHARP: Gets an extra ALERT phase. [Level 4]
THIRD EYE: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the WISH, CURSE, POP, TRANSFORM, and MAGIC SIGHT tables.
CORRUPTED: Immune to Curses
SCROUNGING.: Has developed a knack for finding what other people leave behind. Subtracts one from all rolls on the LOOT table.
KEEN EYE: Developed the ability to see where someone may have hidden something. Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the LOCATE table.

attribute.extra_notes: Exactly the same as the Elf except Type III and VII chits have been replaced with Type II and VIII chits.

attributeVal.N0: ELUSIVENESS: Gets an extra HIDE phase. [Level 2]
ARCHER: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the MISSILE table. [Level 4]

attribute.extra_notes: Requires Robin's Productive Dwarf rule. STONE chit acts like BERSERK.

attributeVal.N0: STONE LEGS: Must spend one additional consecutive MOVE phase to enter any non-cave clearing.
METAMORPHOSIS: Cannot activate Horses, Armor, or Boots.
ARMORED SKIN: Has natural armor (like armored monster).
NIGHT VISION: Extra Phase in Caves.

attribute.extra_notes: Though he talks like some rich dandy, the Beggar King secured his position by being the most violent thug in the Realm.

attributeVal.N0: STREETWISE: Roll 1 die on Meeting Table
SCROUNGE: Roll 1 die on Search tables

STRIKE AND BLOCK: Can strike with FIGHT counter's strength & speed with Tooth/Claw length. Can block attacks using additional FIGHT counter with equal or greater strength by matching or undercutting but equal strengths wound.
PEACE WITH NATURE: No monster summoning for sound/warning chits
BLOCK: Can use additional FIGHT chit without a weapon for blocking attacks.
CLOUDS MINDS: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the HIDE table.
TELEPATHY: Can ENHANCED PEER into any clearing from anywhere.
EAGLE EYE: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the LOCATE, and PEER tables. [Level 2]
MOUNTAINEER: -1 Mountain MOVE Cost. [Level 4]
CONCEALMENT: Roll 1D6 for all HIDE die rolls.
COMPANION EAGLE: Begin with Eagle companion
DRUIDIC PROHIBITION: May not use Steel or Iron Weapons or ranged bows. Magic Weapons ok.
Morning Star
TRAILBLAZER: Dragon friend taught you to Walk Woods

attribute.extra_notes: Leader of an ancient cult of nature worshipers, the High Priestess travels the Realm to restore balance to the world.

attributeVal.N0: SPEAK WITH ANIMALS: Immunity to animals
T Spider
PATH LORE: Knows all paths/passages
ANIMAL FRIENDSHIP: Can command the T Spider, H Spider, Giant Bat, Viper, H Serpent, Wolf, T Serpent, and Octopus.
T Spider
TRACKING: Gets an extra SEARCH phase.
PONY OWNER: Starts with a Pony in inventory.
REINDEER COMPANION: Has a Reindeer companion as a permanent hireling.
CHIMNEY MAGIC: Opens Crypt or Vault without the Keys.
TRAVELER: Knows all paths/passages
FITNESS: Rest Counts Double
COMBAT EXPERIENCE: Gets an extra ALERT phase.
MERCHANT: Gets an extra TRADE phase.
TRADER: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the COMMERCE and MEETING tables.
WOODS CHILD: Was raised in the Woodlands. May Walk the Woods on 7th day of Week.
FOREST WHISPER: Control Woods Monsters. May command Wolves, Vipers, and Ogres.

attribute.extra_notes: Aragorn from the Tolkien books. I got the impression of strengh and agility, combined with good eyes and some magical immunity. Healing (I), and remedy (VIII) are in character.

attributeVal.N0: HALFELVEN: Is immune to the Imp, Demon, and Flying Demon.
WOODCRAFT: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the LOCATE, HIDE, and PEER tables in the Mountains, or Woods.

attribute.extra_notes: The Barbarian is a fierce mountain warrior. He is powerful enough to combat the largest monsters, but he is too slow to out maneuver smaller opponents.

attributeVal.N0: MOUNTAINEER: Costs one less MOVE to enter a Mountain clearing.
MOUNTAINIER TRACKER: Roll one die on HIDE, PEER & LOCATE in Mountain clearings.

attribute.extra_notes: The Ogre Hero has gone a long way since being the village joke. Little Daddy and Big Momma are very proud of their son.

attributeVal.N0: MOUNTAIN FOLK: -1 mountain move cost
OGRE COMMAND: Inspires Other Ogres - Lead and Command Ogres
HERO OF THE PEOPLE: Immunity to humanoids
Sword Orc

CONCEALMENT: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the HIDE table. [Level 2]
PROWLER: Can Walk Woods on 7th day of every week. [Level 3]
NIGHT VISION: Extra Phase in Caves [Level 4]

attribute.extra_notes: The mercenary has gone into debt to purchase his initial equipment (starts with 0 Gold)

attributeVal.N0: DEBT: Starts out with 0 gold, instead of the usual 10.
VIGILANT: Gets an extra ALERT phase.
UNPOPULARITY: Adds one to all rolls on the COMMERCE, TRADE, HIRE, and MEETING tables.
HORSE OWNER: Starts with a Medium Horse in inventory.

attribute.extra_notes: This character requires Robin's Productive Dwarf optional rule.

attributeVal.N0: SHORT LEGS: Must spend one additional consecutive move phase to enter any non-cave clearing. [L1]
CONCEALMENT: Rolls 1 die for rolls on the HIDE table. [L2]
AIM: Subtracts one from all rolls on the MISSILE table. [L3]
DEFT: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the LOOT table. [L4]
ONE WITH NATURE: Is a source of GREY magic. [Level 1]
LONG PRACTICE: No SPX requirement. [Level 4]
NIGHT VISION: Gains an extra phase in caves.
SHADOW SPIRITS: Only roll one die on READ RUNES in caves.
MASSIVE EFFORT: Hard work means hard muscle. Effort limit of 3.
TRADESMAN: Willing to barter. One die on trade rolls.
SMITH: Can REPAIR damaged armor in inventory by recording a REPAIR phase.
SATYR BODY: Restricted from having an active Horse, Pony, Warhorse, or Boots in inventory. [Level 1]
TRACKING SKILLS: Rolls 1 die instead of 2 for all rolls on the SEARCH, MEETING, and HIDE tables in the Woods. [Level 2]

WOODS WALKER: Can Walk the Woods on the 7th day of every week. [Level 4]
DRAGON FRIEND: Dragons cannot attack you. You cannot attack them nor loot the Hoard or Lair
T Flying Dragon

DRAGONRIDER: Can take Heavy Flying Dragons from the same clearing to be an item. Can ride in combat (it retains its attack) or use to FLY during day movement. If this dragon is lost it cannot be replaced.
H Flying Dragon
LUCKY MAN: Starts with Lucky Charm in inventory.
WANDERLUST: Gets an extra MOVE phase.

attribute.text: Must FLY T1 one hex (mountain only)
